topic.title: Share Recording Files
topic.shortdesc: After setting up Call Recording on your PBX, you have two choices to share recording files in your local network: access the recording files via FTP address of the PBX or create a shared folder on the PBX to synchronize recording files from the external storage device.

section.title: Set up File Sharing for Recording Files
section.p: Enable File Sharing feature and create a shared folder on the PBX to synchronize recording files from the USB device, TF card, or hard disk.
